name: Sak
tagline: Speecher Assistive Kit. With sak, your application become assistive directly, without changing anything in your code.
body:
sak
===

Speecher Assistive Kit.

For fpc, fpGui, Lazarus, Delphi
On Linux, Windows, Mac, Android,...

With sak, your application become assistive directly, without changing anything in your code.

Multi languages, multi voices, multi forms.

You do not blow up your application, only 1 megas with multi-languages-voices and libraries.
You do not need external system like ST-SPI, Orca, SAPI nor external libraries ...
Sak uses runtime dynamic loading of libraries so you can choose where to install the kit.

Sak uses the fabulous eSpeak and PortAudio Open Source Libraries.

Fred van Stappen    fiens@hotmail.com      2013.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
